splash.name: Splash Screen

logo.source: logo_dark.png or logo_light.png based on system theme

navigation_behavior.exit: Auto-navigate to Login (if not authenticated) or Dashboard (if authenticated)

styling_guidelines.background: Gradient from white to light indigo (#EEF2FF)
styling_guidelines.animation: Subtle fade-in for logo, continuous spin for loader
styling_guidelines.safe_areas: Respect device safe areas (notch, home indicator)

splash.mockup_description: Clean white-to-indigo gradient background. Centered 'Clinic' logo with pink dot accent. Small circular loading spinner in indigo below the logo. Minimal, elegant, professional first impression.

login.name: Login Screen

signup_link.text: Don't have an account? Sign up
signup_link.style: text link, primary color on 'Sign up'

navigation_behavior.entry: From Splash (if not authenticated) or Logout

styling_guidelines.input_fields: 48px height, 12px border-radius, 1px gray-200 border, 16px horizontal padding
styling_guidelines.input_focus: 2px primary border, light indigo background tint
styling_guidelines.button: 48px height, 8px border-radius, primary color, white text, shadow

login.mockup_description: Clean white background. Small Clinic logo at top. 'Welcome back' headline with gray subtext. Two input fields with left-aligned icons (envelope for email, lock for password). Password field has eye toggle on right. Full-width indigo 'Sign In' button. Gray 'Forgot password?' link below. 'Don't have an account? Sign up' at bottom with 'Sign up' in indigo.

dashboard.name: Dashboard Screen
dashboard.purpose: Main overview of leads and activity

recent_leads.items: 3-4 lead cards showing name, source, status, time

upcoming_followups.items: 2-3 follow-up items with name, time, type (call/message)

navigation_behavior.entry: From Login success, or tab navigation
navigation_behavior.tap_followup_item: Navigate to Calendar or Lead Detail

styling_guidelines.stat_cards: White background, 12px radius, card shadow, 120px min-width, 16px padding
styling_guidelines.list_items: 16px padding, bottom border (gray-100), no outer border
styling_guidelines.bottom_nav: White background, top shadow, 56px height, 5 equal tabs

dashboard.mockup_description: Light gray background (#F8FAFC). White header with 'Good morning, Maria' greeting, date below, circular avatar on right with notification bell (red badge showing '3'). Horizontal scrollable row of 4 stat cards: New Leads (12), Follow-ups Due (5), Closed This Week (8), Conversion Rate (34%). Each card has colored accent on left edge. White section for 'Recent Leads' showing 3 lead items with name, Instagram icon, 'New' status badge, and '2h ago' timestamp. White section for 'Upcoming Follow-ups' showing 2 items with phone/message icons, name, and scheduled time. Fixed bottom navigation with 5 tabs: Home (filled), Leads, Kanban, Calendar, Settings.

lead_list.name: Lead List Screen
lead_list.purpose: Full list view of all leads with search and filter
visual_hierarchy: 1. Header with title and add button

filter_chips.style: Horizontal scroll, pill-shaped, selected has primary background

empty_state.title: No leads yet
empty_state.subtitle: Add your first lead to get started

navigation_behavior.entry: From bottom tab or Dashboard 'View All'

styling_guidelines.search_bar: Gray-100 background, 40px height, 20px radius, 12px horizontal padding
styling_guidelines.filter_chips: 32px height, 12px horizontal padding, gray-200 default, primary when selected
styling_guidelines.list_item: 72px height, 16px horizontal padding, gray-100 bottom border
styling_guidelines.avatar: 44px, 22px radius, gray-200 background if no image
styling_guidelines.status_badge: 6px vertical padding, 12px horizontal, 12px radius, light colored background with dark text

lead_list.mockup_description: White background. Header shows 'Leads' title on left, indigo plus-circle icon on right. Search bar below with gray background and search icon. Horizontal scrollable filter chips: 'All' (selected, indigo background), 'New', 'Contacted', 'Scheduled', 'Closed', 'Lost'. List of lead items, each showing: circular avatar with initials, name in bold, small Instagram or WhatsApp icon with source label, colored status badge ('New' in indigo, 'Contacted' in amber), timestamp on right, chevron. Subtle gray divider between items.

lead_detail.name: Lead Detail Screen
lead_detail.purpose: Complete information and actions for a single lead
visual_hierarchy: 1. Header with back button and actions

navigation_behavior.tap_call: Open phone dialer with lead's number

styling_guidelines.profile_card: White background, 16px padding, no border radius (full width)
styling_guidelines.quick_action_buttons: 64px square, white background, 12px radius, icon 24px, label 12px
styling_guidelines.timeline_item: 12px left padding, gray left border, relative timestamp

lead_detail.mockup_description: Light gray background. Top header with back arrow, lead name 'Sarah Johnson' centered, three-dot menu on right. White profile card: large circular avatar with initials 'SJ', name below in bold, 'Via Instagram' with IG icon, 'Added Jan 15, 2026' in gray, 'Contacted' badge in amber. Row of 4 square quick action buttons below: Call (phone icon), WhatsApp (chat icon), Email (envelope icon), Schedule (calendar icon). Status section with 5 horizontal pills - 'Contacted' is selected/highlighted. White notes card with 'Notes & Activity' header, text input at top, timeline below showing notes and status changes with timestamps. 'Interested In' section showing treatment tags as chips.

kanban.name: Kanban Board Screen
kanban.purpose: Visual pipeline view of all leads by status

navigation_behavior.drag_card: Move lead to different column (update status)

styling_guidelines.column_width: 280px (mobile optimized for partial view of next column)
styling_guidelines.column_header: Sticky, white background, colored left accent, 48px height
styling_guidelines.lead_card: White background, 12px radius, card shadow, 12px padding

kanban.mockup_description: Light gray background. 'Pipeline' header at top. Horizontally scrollable view showing 5 columns. Each column has a header with colored left accent bar (indigo for New, amber for Contacted, purple for Scheduled, green for Closed, red for Lost), column title, and count badge. Below headers, vertical stacks of white lead cards. Each card shows lead name, small source icon, optional treatment tags, and timestamp. Column widths sized so user can see partial next column (encouraging scroll). Cards are visually draggable. Subtle drop shadows on cards.

calendar.name: Calendar / Follow-ups Screen

calendar_grid.day_cells: Numbered, dots for days with follow-ups

followups_list.empty_state: No follow-ups scheduled for this day

navigation_behavior.entry: From bottom tab or Lead Detail 'Schedule'
navigation_behavior.tap_day: Select day, show day's follow-ups below

styling_guidelines.calendar_grid: White background, 16px padding, gray-200 grid lines
styling_guidelines.selected: Primary color filled circle, white text
styling_guidelines.dot_indicator: 6px circle, primary color, below date number
styling_guidelines.followup_item: 72px height, left time column (60px), content column, type icon

calendar.mockup_description: White background. Header shows 'Follow-ups' with Month/Week toggle (Month selected). Calendar navigation shows 'January 2026' with left/right arrows. Calendar grid displays full month with day numbers. Today (15) has a primary color circle outline. Days with scheduled follow-ups have small indigo dots below the number. Tapping a day selects it (filled indigo circle). Below calendar, 'January 15' section header, followed by list of follow-ups: '10:00 AM' in left column, phone icon, 'Sarah Johnson - Laser consultation'. Floating action button (FAB) in bottom right corner with plus icon.

reports.name: Reports Screen

header.title: Reports
header.period_selector: This Week / This Month / Custom dropdown

ui_components: Pie/donut chart or bar chart for sources

styling_guidelines.metric_cards: White, 12px radius, 16px padding, large bold number, small label
styling_guidelines.chart_colors: Use brand palette (primary, secondary, success, warning)
styling_guidelines.funnel_bars: Horizontal, gradient from full to proportional width

reports.mockup_description: Light gray background. Header shows 'Reports' with 'This Month' dropdown selector. 2x2 grid of white metric cards: 'Total Leads: 47 (+12%)' with green text for positive change, 'Conversion Rate: 34%', 'Closed Sales: 16', 'Avg. Close Time: 4.2 days'. Below, white card with 'Conversion Funnel' title showing horizontal funnel visualization - bars decreasing from New (full width) to Closed (34% width), with stage labels and percentages. Another white card showing 'Lead Sources' with horizontal bar chart or donut chart showing Instagram (60%), WhatsApp (30%), Phone (10%) in different brand colors.

settings.name: Settings Screen

navigation_behavior.entry: From bottom tab or profile tap

styling_guidelines.group_header: Gray uppercase label, 12px font, 16px top margin

settings.mockup_description: Light gray background. Top white section with large circular avatar (user photo or initials), user name 'Maria Santos' in bold below, email in gray, 'Edit Profile' link in primary color. White grouped section 'ACCOUNT' with rows: Edit Profile, Change Password, Notifications (with toggle switch), Team Members - each with left icon and right chevron. White grouped section 'CLINIC' with: Clinic Info, Treatments & Prices, Pipeline Stages. White grouped section 'SUPPORT' with: Help Center, Contact Support, Rate the App. Centered 'Version 1.0.0' text in gray. Privacy Policy | Terms links. Red 'Log Out' button at bottom.

treatments_list.name: Treatments & Services Screen
treatments_list.purpose: Manage treatment price list for quick sharing

item_structure.name: Treatment name
item_structure.edit_button: Pencil icon or tap to edit

styling_guidelines.share_button: Full width at bottom, primary color, 48px height

treatments_list.mockup_description: White background. Header shows 'Treatments' with plus icon on right. Search bar below. Horizontal category chips: All (selected), Face, Body, Laser, Injectables. List of treatments: 'Botox (Forehead)' with '$350' price on right and '30 mins' duration below in gray, 'Laser Hair Removal - Full Legs' with '$200/session', 'Chemical Peel' with '$150'. Subtle dividers between items. Fixed bottom bar with 'Share Price List' button in primary indigo color.

mobile_first_rules: Font size minimum 16px for inputs (prevents iOS zoom)
Bottom navigation always visible (except during scroll on lists)
Cards have 12px border-radius for soft appearance
Use shadows sparingly - card shadow only

typography.font_family: Inter (body), Plus Jakarta Sans (headlines if used)
